body:
If this is the wrong email address, you can [change your email](/solicitor/change/check) and send your application again.

### What happens next

The LAA will consider your appeal and aim to email you with a decision within 2 working days.

If you do not hear back by then, contact <iojappeals@justice.gov.uk>.

### Make another appeal

You can [appeal for another defendant](/).
heading: Application complete
lede: Weâ€™ll send your application to the Legal Aid Agency (LAA) and a copy to {solicitor_email}
